para.text: Except as otherwise specified, a reference in this subchapter to a section or provision of the Workforce Investment Act of 1998, approved August 7, 1998 (112 Stat. 936; 29 U.S.C. ยง 2822), shall be deemed to be a reference to the corresponding provision of the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act, approved July 22, 2014 (Pub. L. No 113-128; 128 Stat. 1425).
This section shall apply as of July 22, 1014 [2014].

annotations.annotation: as added May 2, 2015, D.C. Law 20-263, ยง 2(n), 62 DCR 1518
